definition: the spore-producing individual or phase in the life cycle of a plant having alternation of generations
opposite_reasoning: Gametophyte is the strongest biological complement to Sporophyte (which is the core definition provided). In plant biology, these represent the two alternating generations in the life cycle - spore-producing (sporophyte) vs. gamete-producing (gametophyte). This is a well-established taxonomic complementary pair with high opposition strength. While the steering utility for AI safety is moderate, the semantic clarity and biological validity make it the best choice. The definition given appears to focus specifically on sporophyte, making gametophyte the natural opposite.
